text: Robert Walter Henry Sayers (26 October 1917 - 28 November 2016), better known as Bob Sayers, was an Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1917 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Bob Sayers
